description._content: Hine, Lewis Wickes,, 1874-1940,, photographer. Exhibit panel. [1914?] 1 photographic print. Notes: Title from NCLC caption card. Attribution to Hine based on provenance. In album: Miscellaneous. Hine no. 3782. No location or date recorded on caption card; date estimate based on captions for photographs with neighboring numbers. Subjects: Exhibitions. Child labor. United States. Format: Photographic prints. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Photographs from the records of the National Child Labor Committee (U.S.) 2004667950 General information about the Lewis Hine child labor photos is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.nclc Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/nclc.04959 Call Number: LOT 7483, v. 2, no. 3782
